bibdata.title: A summary of the NBS literature reviews on the chemical nature and toxicity of the pyrolysis and combustion products from seven plastics : acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrenes (ABS), nylons, polyesters, polyethylenes, polystyrenes, poly(vinyl chlorides) and rigid polyurethane foams

A summary of the NBS literature reviews on the chemical nature and toxicity of the pyrolysis and combustion products from seven plastics : acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrenes (ABS), nylons, polyesters, polyethylenes, polystyrenes, poly(vinyl chlorides) and rigid polyurethane foams
